name: Old Man Hachi
description: Runs 'Hachi's Parts,' a cluttered electronics repair shop. Can find or fix any piece of hardware, new or old.
A rival DJ and host of a popular pirate radio show. Their rivalry with Astreia is friendly and professional.

name: Oba-san
description: The cheerful, elderly woman who runs the 'Midnight Ramen' food stall, which serves as a neutral ground for NetOps.
A grizzled NetOp who specializes in hunting rogue viruses and corrupted Navis with his Navi, Hound.EXE.

name: Jenson
description: A smug, low-level corporate security NetOp who patrols official servers with his generic SecuriNavi.EXE.

name: Dr. Aris Thorne
description: A brilliant but morally conflicted researcher in OmniCorp's Navi R&D division. A potential source of leaks.
An untrustworthy Navi who runs a black-market chip shop hidden deep within the Junk-Heap.
A teenage punk and wannabe DataWraith. His Navi, Jynx.EXE, is loaded with viral code, making it unpredictable and chaotic.
A paranoid but genius coder who acts as one of the FNF's chief strategists and exploit finders.
A young, athletic FNF activist who acts as a real-world scout and courier. A parkour enthusiast and friend of Ren.
